alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 12:46PM PST until February 28 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 1 inch. * WHERE...Sandpoint, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Eastport, Newport, Priest River, Athol, Deer Park, Orin-Rice Road, Chewelah, Metaline, Clark Fork, Bonners Ferry, Northport, Colville, Metaline Falls, Kettle Falls, Ione, Tiger, Springdale-Hunters Road, Flowery Trail Road, and Fruitland. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions on untreated roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
